law.text: The court may adjourn the whole or part of the petit jury to any day of their required periods of service, but they shall not be paid for the time they stand adjourned. The grand jury may be adjourned in like manner without pay.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 30, effective January 2, 1978.
